summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department in connection with the West Seattle Freeway Project; authorizing the City Engineer to prepare plans, specifications and estimates; to commence with the right of way activities including a relocation plan; and to prepare Environment Documents as may be needed; and, authorizing the Mayor to enter into and execute agreements with the Washington State Urban Arterial Board, the Washington State Department of Transportation and/or other agencies as necessary for completion of the above mentioned activities; and, authorizing these activities to be funded by appropriation previously made by Ordinance No. 102766 as amended by Ordinance No. 103791 for these purposes; and further, superseding Ordinance No. 107287.
